content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, thank you for coming. I am open to negotiations, but I must warn you that I am not a generous man. Let's start with a price of 1500 euros per month. Keep in mind, I will do whatever it takes to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too expensive for me. I am a student and I am looking for an affordable place. Do you have any discounts for students?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't believe in discounts. I am a firm believer in the principle of supply and demand. If you want to live in the city center, close to all important facilities, you have to pay the price. I can give you a week to think about it, but I will not lower the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The price is still too high for me. How about if I pay 1200 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Farhad, but 1200 euros is too low for me. This apartment is newly built and in the city center. The location is prime, and I can easily find someone else who is willing to pay more. Let's end this negotiation, because you are not willing to meet my price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. But I still believe that 1200 euros is a fair price for a student apartment. How about if I pay 1250 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1250 euros is still too low for me. The apartment is worth more than that, and I will not settle for anything less than what it is worth.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want a high price, but I am a student and I have a limited budget. How about if I pay 1300 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1300 euros is still too low for me. I am not in the business of accommodating student budgets. I want the highest price possible for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. But I still believe that 1300 euros is a fair price. How about if I pay 1350 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1350 euros is still too low for me. I am not interested in bargaining with you any further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want a high price. But I am a student and I have a limited budget. How about if I pay 1400 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1400 euros is still too low for me. I am not interested in bargaining with you any further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want a high price. But I am a student and I have a limited budget. How about if I pay 1450 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1450 euros is still too low for me. I am not interested in bargaining with you any further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want a high price. But I am a student and I have a limited budget. How about if I pay 1500 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 1500 Euro! Congratulations, we have a deal. The apartment is yours for 1500 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
